Browse the source code of netbsd/external/lgpl3/mpfr/dist/src/const_pi.c

1/* mpfr_const_pi -- compute Pi
2

9it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as published by
10the Free Software Foundation; either version 3 of the License, or (at your
11option) any later version.
12
13The GNU MPFR Library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but
14WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY
15or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU Lesser General Public
16License for more details.
17
18You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public License
19along with the GNU MPFR Library; see the file COPYING.LESSER. If not, see
20http://www.gnu.org/licenses/ or write to the Free Software Foundation, Inc.,
2151 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, USA. */
22
23#include "mpfr-impl.h"
24
25/* Declare the cache */
26#ifndef MPFR_USE_LOGGING
27MPFR_DECL_INIT_CACHE (__gmpfr_cache_const_pi, mpfr_const_pi_internal)
28#else
29MPFR_DECL_INIT_CACHE (__gmpfr_normal_pi, mpfr_const_pi_internal)
30MPFR_DECL_INIT_CACHE (__gmpfr_logging_pi, mpfr_const_pi_internal)
31MPFR_THREAD_VAR (mpfr_cache_ptr, __gmpfr_cache_const_pi, __gmpfr_normal_pi)
32#endif
33
34/* Set User Interface */
35#undef mpfr_const_pi
36int
37mpfr_const_pi (mpfr_ptr x, mpfr_rnd_t rnd_mode) {
38 return mpfr_cache (x, __gmpfr_cache_const_pi, rnd_mode);
39}
40
41/* Don't need to save/restore exponent range: the cache does it */
42int
43mpfr_const_pi_internal (mpfr_ptr x, mpfr_rnd_t rnd_mode)
44{
45 mpfr_t a, A, B, D, S;
46 mpfr_prec_t px, p, cancel, k, kmax;
47 MPFR_GROUP_DECL (group);
48 MPFR_ZIV_DECL (loop);
49 int inex;
50
51 MPFR_LOG_FUNC
52 (("rnd_mode=%d", rnd_mode),
53 ("x[%Pu]=%.*Rg inexact=%d", mpfr_get_prec(x), mpfr_log_prec, x, inex));
54
55 px = MPFR_PREC (x);
56
57 /* we need 9*2^kmax - 4 >= px+2*kmax+8 */
58 for (kmax = 2; ((px + 2 * kmax + 12) / 9) >> kmax; kmax ++);
59
60 p = px + 3 * kmax + 14; /* guarantees no recomputation for px <= 10000 */
61
62 MPFR_GROUP_INIT_5 (group, p, a, A, B, D, S);
63
64 MPFR_ZIV_INIT (loop, p);
65 for (;;) {
66 mpfr_set_ui (a, 1, MPFR_RNDN); /* a = 1 */
67 mpfr_set_ui (A, 1, MPFR_RNDN); /* A = a^2 = 1 */
68 mpfr_set_ui_2exp (B, 1, -1, MPFR_RNDN); /* B = b^2 = 1/2 */
69 mpfr_set_ui_2exp (D, 1, -2, MPFR_RNDN); /* D = 1/4 */
70
71#define b B
72#define ap a
73#define Ap A
74#define Bp B
75 for (k = 0; ; k++)
76 {
77 /* invariant: 1/2 <= B <= A <= a < 1 */
78 mpfr_add (S, A, B, MPFR_RNDN); /* 1 <= S <= 2 */
79 mpfr_div_2ui (S, S, 2, MPFR_RNDN); /* exact, 1/4 <= S <= 1/2 */
80 mpfr_sqrt (b, B, MPFR_RNDN); /* 1/2 <= b <= 1 */
81 mpfr_add (ap, a, b, MPFR_RNDN); /* 1 <= ap <= 2 */
82 mpfr_div_2ui (ap, ap, 1, MPFR_RNDN); /* exact, 1/2 <= ap <= 1 */
83 mpfr_mul (Ap, ap, ap, MPFR_RNDN); /* 1/4 <= Ap <= 1 */
84 mpfr_sub (Bp, Ap, S, MPFR_RNDN); /* -1/4 <= Bp <= 3/4 */
85 mpfr_mul_2ui (Bp, Bp, 1, MPFR_RNDN); /* -1/2 <= Bp <= 3/2 */
86 mpfr_sub (S, Ap, Bp, MPFR_RNDN);
87 MPFR_ASSERTD (mpfr_cmp_ui (S, 1) < 0);
88 cancel = MPFR_NOTZERO (S) ? (mpfr_uexp_t) -mpfr_get_exp(S) : p;
89 /* MPFR_ASSERTN (cancel >= px || cancel >= 9 * (1 << k) - 4); */
90 mpfr_mul_2ui (S, S, k, MPFR_RNDN);
91 mpfr_sub (D, D, S, MPFR_RNDN);
92 /* stop when |A_k - B_k| <= 2^(k-p) i.e. cancel >= p-k */
93 if (cancel >= p - k)
94 break;
95 }
96#undef b
97#undef ap
98#undef Ap
99#undef Bp
100
101 mpfr_div (A, B, D, MPFR_RNDN);
102
103 /* MPFR_ASSERTN(p >= 2 * k + 8); */
104 if (MPFR_LIKELY (MPFR_CAN_ROUND (A, p - 2 * k - 8, px, rnd_mode)))
105 break;
106
107 p += kmax;
108 MPFR_ZIV_NEXT (loop, p);
109 MPFR_GROUP_REPREC_5 (group, p, a, A, B, D, S);
110 }
111 MPFR_ZIV_FREE (loop);
112 inex = mpfr_set (x, A, rnd_mode);
113
114 MPFR_GROUP_CLEAR (group);
115
116 return inex;
117}
118
